quotes: Exploring the world, one city at a time.

Roaming where the WiFi is weak.
Adventure is calling, and I must go.
Let's find some beautiful place to get lost.
Travel is the only thing you can buy that makes you richer.
Life is an adventure, dare it.
In a relationship with my passport.
Travel far enough, you meet yourself.
Exploring the world with my favorite travel buddy.
Savoring the journey, not just the destination.
The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
Exploring the beauty of the unknown.
Living on the edge and loving it.
Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.
Adventure is out there, you just have to go and find it.
Exploring the world one step at a time.
Take only memories, leave only footprints.
Travel, because money returns, time doesnât.
Wandering where the WiFi is weak.
Life is short, and the world is wide.
Let's find some beautiful place to get lost.
Roaming where the WiFi is weak.
